title: I need a freelancer with basic HTML knowledge for help with data extraction.
snippet:
software a plus.

We are transitioning to a new marketing automation software platform and need assistance in saving the emails created in our current software. 

The freelancer would log in to our software system, open each individual email and save the source code as an HTML file. 

This will be an estimated 15-20 hours of work to open 1200 emails and save them as HTML files.
